title: Dangerous goods transport documents (ADR/DOT)
dataVerified: Shipper, carrier, consignee, hazmat UN number, packing group, emergency info
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Transport status (authorized/completed). Link to shipper/carrier system (regulators and emergency responders, requires authentication)
rationale: ADR (EU) / DOT (USA) hazmat compliance. Domain binding verifies shipper/carrier. Prevents fake hazmat declarations (highway safety). Long liability retention. Emergency responder verification.
